mapper.select: select * from t_book where title like '%${title}%'
mapper.insert: insert into t_book(title, author, translator, downloads, collections, upload_user_id, upload_username, upload_time, book_state, book_path, cover_path, comments) VALUES (#{title}, #{author}, #{translator}, #{downloads}, #{collections}, #{uploadUserId}, #{uploadUsername}, #{uploadTime}, #{bookState}, #{bookPath}, #{coverPath}, #{comments})
